data.title: Tendring District
data.text:
Welcome to Tendring District u3a

Please note...our old website address will very shortly be withdrawn and the only way to access the site will be via tendring.u3asite.uk

A message from our committee.

A very warm welcome to our u3a – we hope you will enjoy visiting our website.

Tendring District U3A encompasses Clacton-on-Sea and nearby villages on the Tendring peninsular, we meet at Holland on Sea Public Hall on the first Friday of every month at 2-15pm with a guest speaker.

Tendring may be flat, but with big skies and wonderful sunsets, it is certainly not without interest, and neither is the U3A movement! We hope you will look further at our website, and perhaps explore the websites of our related groups based in Brightlingsea, Frinton & Walton and Harwich Peninsular .

We have an enthusiastic and friendly membership of over 200. Our study groups are varied and new groups will be formed as interest is shown and members are forthcoming who are prepared to act as group co-ordinators.

Founded in 1982, u3a is a world wide movement of locally-run interest groups that provide a wide range of opportunities to come together to learn for fun. Members explore new ideas, skills and activities together.

There are 1,057 u3as with nearly 400,000 members; membership costs less than £20 on average per year and is open to everyone who’s not working full-time.

u3a has members who draw upon their knowledge and experience to teach and learn from each other but there are no qualifications to pass – it is just for pleasure. Learning is its own reward.

It's all voluntary; a typical u3a will be home to many activity groups covering many different subjects - from art to walking and everything in between.

For All Enquiries please see the Contact page

YOUR TENDRING DISTRICT U3A COMMITTEE

Keith Lamdin Chairman & Group Co-ordinator.

Paul Bryant Vice Chair + Membership Sec

OFF COMMITTEE

Holland Public Hall. Susan Taylor

Website Terry Hutchinson

Beacon Philip Price

Speakers at Holland-on-Sea Public Hall.

September 6th. The work of Marie Curie Charity. Angela Taylor

October 4th. Gilbert & Sullivan music. Bernard Lockett

November 1st. Influences on my crime writing. David Evans. (David is a local author writing novels set in Tendring & West Yorkshire)

December 6th. Lost Direction (Shanty Singers) Ben Thomas

Check out our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/Tendringu3a

NEXT WALK....Walton-on-the-Naze: Tuesday August 13th 10-30am. Drive past the Columbine swimming pool and turn right into Green Lane which takes you to the meeting point, Cliff Parade CO14 8HB

Short walk approximately 3 miles. Please let Sally know if you are coming. 07562311199

What is u3a? Members have said: -

It's where I share my interests

It's a Youth Club for Seniors

u3a keeps me fit and active

I'm never lonely, never bored

Interest Groups Online

If you would prefer to meet people and learn together online, you can join Interest Groups Online (formerly called Trust u3a). Membership costs £12 per year.

Interest Groups Online is a platform for collaborative learning. It is an online community, bringing people together from all across the u3a movement and beyond. There are around 70 different groups that meet online across a wide range of subjects. Groups are interactive and vary depending on the needs of the participants.

Please note: local u3a and Interest Groups Online are separate membership options. You can join one or both – it’s up to you.

Find out more on our Interest Groups Online page.
